code: import axios from'axios';export var GetBookList=function GetBookList(page,limit,searchValue){return axios.get("/api/bookList?page=".concat(page,"&limit=").concat(limit,"&searchValue=").concat(searchValue));};export var AddBook=function AddBook(para){return axios.post('/api/addBook',para);};export var DelBook=function DelBook(para){return axios.delete('/api/delBook',para);};export var EditBook=function EditBook(para){return axios.post('/api/editBook',para);};export var GetUserList=function GetUserList(){return axios.get('/api/userList');};export var AddUser=function AddUser(para){return axios.post('/api/addUser',para);};export var EditUser=function EditUser(para){return axios.post('/api/editUser',para);};export var DelUser=function DelUser(para){return axios.post('/api/delUser',para);};export var GetPicList=function GetPicList(){return axios.get('/api/picList');};export var GetMyBooks=function GetMyBooks(userId){return axios.get("/api/myBooks?userId=".concat(userId));};export var TakeBook=function TakeBook(para){return axios.post('/api/takeBook',para);};export var BackBook=function BackBook(para){return axios.post('/api/backBook',para);};export var ToLogin=function ToLogin(para){return axios.post('/api/login',para);};export var SignIn=function SignIn(para){return axios.post('/api/signIn',para);};
